summary: This mod add to the game a greatsword called Necroxym, Insted of having it directly forgable at the forge, i wanted something different, so i imagine a lil scenario for you to have access to this mighty blade...
descriptionHtml:
Mod Name: Reaper\'s Necroxym, The secret behind its creation
By: Reaper9111
Version:1


Description
===========
This mod add to the game a greatsword called Necroxym, Insted of having it directly forgable at the forge, i wanted something different, so i imagine a lil scenario for you to have access to this mighty blade... A big thanks to Xplosivwar69 who dedicated himself into writting a great story for this mod. You\'ll need to discover Necroxym\'s tomb first and read his story, Than, with the book IN your inventory, you\'ll be  able to craft 2 version of the sword, a replica, and the real Necroxym, a powerfull blade with enchantments...
As seen on the pictures, the sword have glowing runes on the blade, the necromancer\'s logo and the crystal also glow white at night, making the sword very special...
The replica version can be craft at any time assuming you have the right material, the enchanted version can only be crafted if you have 100 Enchanter... (Don\'t ask i will not chage this, since you can than learn it... You must work to get powerful !-)
But once you do, the enchantement can be learned ! Remember that the book need to be IN your inventory when attempting to craft or temper any of the 2 version.
The stats are a lil better than daedric... If it seem high on the pictures, it because i\'m boost in 2handed !
Enchantment on the Real Version of the sword are: 
- Soultrap
- Steal life
- Extra damage to undead and werewolf
- Extra damage under moonlight
The tomb is located somewhere north-west of Falkreath, see the location picture !
I hope you will enjoy this mod, and remember to endorse it if you like it !-)
[youtube]HPXxZznbKac[/youtube]

Required mods
=============
None.


Install
=======
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Activates the selected mod\" button.


Manual install
==============
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\:
.- the Meshes folder
.- the Textures folder
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say \"Yes to all\".  


Upgrade
=======
Not aplicable at this time.


Uninstall
=========
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Deactivates the selected mod\" button.


Manual uninstall
================
1. Delete:
.- the folder \\meshes\\that you have previously installed.
.- the folder \\Textures\\that you have previously installed.
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
None


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None


Future plans
============
None

Remember to ENDORSE the mod if you like it !
